query: SELECT id, guestName, `status`, checkInAt, expiresAt, duration, reminderShown, NOW() as server_now, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), expiresAt) as seconds_until_expiry FROM guestSessions WHERE `status` IN ('active', 'extended') ORDER BY expiresAt ASC LIMIT 20;
